title: Jake Owen Plays Unreleased Song In Studio + Movie Mike's Movie Recommendation Reviews + Lunchbox Wants Some Time Off Work
itunes:title: Jake Owen Plays Unreleased Song In Studio + Movie Mike's Movie Recommendation Reviews + Lunchbox Wants Some Time Off Work
description:
Jake Owen stops by the studio to perform some of his biggest hits along with an unreleased song! We review the movies assigned to us by our movie expert, Mike D. If we give them bad reviews, he has to be punished. Bobby asks Lunchbox why he's asking for time off work for a scavenger hunt. Plus, we talk to Kevin Kinard who visited Arkansas's Crater of Diamonds State Park and found the second-largest diamond to ever be found in the park's history!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
